wordpressPost.title: Chance The Rapper avlyser turné
wordpressPost.content:
Chance The Rapper avlyst konsertene han hadde planlagt i Europa i august, blant annet Øyafestivalen. Avlysningen har vært helt utenfor vår kontroll. Det jobbes med å finne en erstatter.

Her er meldingen vi har fått fra artistens europeiske agent: It is with regret that Chance the Rapper has to cancel his upcoming performance at Øya and his European festival tour in August. This is due to scheduling conflicts beyond his control. Chance sends his apologies to his fans and looks forward to returning to Europe soon.  

foto Steffen Rikenberg
